abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us what you've made by hand, and what you've learned from doing it.
snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us what you've made by hand, and what you've learned from doing it.
lead_paragraph: We borrow this question from a teacher at the Bertie Early College High School in Windsor, N.C., who asks her students to name the last thing they have made themselves, even if it is as simple as cookies, to get them thinking about design. What have you made yourself, recently or at any time in your life? Do you like making things by hand? Do you wish your school had a design or building course?
